text: "The Ballad of Billy the Kid" is a 1974 song by Billy Joel. It is the third single from his second studio album Piano Man. It was a concert staple from 1974 to 1979 and was used on his 1981 live album Songs in the Attic. It did not chart on any of the singles charts. == References == Category:1974 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: The Ballad of Billy the Kid
